articles.description: Follow all the latest news and coverage as Europe's top competition returns in its new format with build-up to Liverpool and Aston Villa's matches.
articles.title: Champions League returns: Build-up and all you need to know

articles.description: As Kylian Mbappe faces a new challenge at Real Madrid, Spanish football expert Guillem Balague examines the hurdles he is facing for club and country.
articles.title: Champions League: Will Kylian Mbappe adapt to new role at Real Madrid?

articles.description: Film stars, an NFL legend and a global football icon were watching but in the end they were cameos in Birmingham's 3-1 win over Wrexham.
articles.title: Birmingham City 3-1 Wrexham: Tom Brady, David Beckham and Ryan Reynolds on the phone

articles.description: Briton's Emma Raducanu earns a hard-fought win in a "tough" match against Peyton Stearns in the first round of the Korea Open.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu battles to first-round win over Peyton Stearns at Korea Open

articles.description: Anthony Joshua says he has "been through a lot of pain" over the past two years as he bids to become a three-time world champion against fellow British heavyweight Daniel Dubois on Saturday.
articles.title: Anthony Joshua vs Daniel Dubois: Joshua says he has "been through a lot of pain" on journey to world-title shot

articles.description: Is this Lando Norris' best shot at the title, and what is 'scrubbing' tyres? BBC F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions after the Azerbaijan GP.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Piastri, Norris, Red Bull, Leclerc, Newey, Aston Martin

articles.description: Atlanta Falcons pick up their first win of the 2024 NFL season with a dramatic 22-21 victory away at the Philadelphia Eagles.
articles.title: NFL: Atlanta Falcons score late touchdown to beat Philadelphia Eagles 22-21

articles.description: BBC Sport examines how the allure of Real Madrid has enabled them to assemble a new team of young "Galacticos", as the Champions League holders aim to win a record-extending 16th European crown.
articles.title: Real Madrid: How Champions League holders built new Galacticos team

articles.description: The Champions League will follow a new format from 2024-25 - BBC Sport explains what will change and what will stay the same.
articles.title: New Champions League format explained and how to watch highlights on BBC

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says Brazil winger Antony must "earn the right" to play.
articles.title: Man Utd: Antony must earn right to play - Erik ten Hag
